+ Camel Case

A word is typed in Camel Case, if:

	* it starts with some UPPERCASE letter(s),
	* followed by some lowercase letter(s),
	* followed by at least one more UPPERCASE letter(s)
	* eventually followed by more lowercase letter(s) - or none

See also http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/CamelCase
